testcase.name: Searching for a property of a price between 150 to 700k
testcase.system-out: Given I am on search location page on "browser".............................passed When I select my search radious as "5miles".................................passed And I select minium price range as "200,000"................................passed And I select maximum price range as "700,000"...............................passed And I select Propery type as "Houses".......................................passed And I click on find Properties button.......................................passed Then I should be Presented with SearcH......................................passed

testcase.name: Searching for Selenium book
